paper.title: Recurrent Neural Network GO-GARCH Model for Portfolio Selection
paper.abstract: We develop a hybrid model of multivariate volatility that uses recurrent neural networks to capture the conditional variances of latent orthogonal factors in a GO-GARCH framework. Our approach seeks to balance model flexibility with ease of estimation and can be used to model conditional covariances of a large number of assets. The model performs favourably in comparison with relevant benchmark models in a minimum variance portfolio (MVP) scenario.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用递归神经网络在GO-GARCH框架下建模资产的条件协方差，并应用于最小方差投资组合（MVP）场景，这直接属于投资组合管理的范畴。
